meanings.definition: An employee who does all kinds of work.
meanings.sent1: The factotum at the office is always busy with various tasks.
meanings.sent2: The factotum was responsible for cleaning, filing, and answering phones.
meanings.sent3: The factotum juggled so many tasks, they sometimes forgot which one to do next!
meanings.sent4: She was the factotum of the household, keeping everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The factotum's role was like a Swiss Army knife, versatile and indispensable.

meanings.definition: A person having many diverse activities or responsibilities.
meanings.sent1: As a factotum, he managed the finances, events, and maintenance of the building.
meanings.sent2: She embraced her role as a factotum, thriving in the midst of various tasks.
meanings.sent3: The factotum's schedule was so packed, they needed a personal assistant for their personal life!
meanings.sent4: He was the factotum of the community, always lending a hand wherever needed.
meanings.sent5: The factotum's life resembled a colorful mosaic, each piece representing a different responsibility.
